name: Eity
description:
Eity is a free simple rhythm game. 

Game's current state is on hold due to my current state of health. I will maybe keep updating it after I get my health issues fixed and might make a map maker, so you can make your own maps with your own songs.

Game is in playable state, but still misses some features, mostly effects and map fixes.

Features
  • 10 Unique levels, with different difficulties.
  • 100% free game.
  • Game pad support
  • Game modifications that makes the levels even more challenging and fun.
  • Very simple looking UI.
  • Discord Rich Presence
  • Runs even on old and low-end computers.
  • Two kind of notes, blue notes that you collect and red notes that you dodge.
Controls
  • Change  direction - WASD, Arrow keys
  • Pause game - Esc
  • Hide UI - Tab
  • Restart - R
